p: The EOs of C. procera collected from Saudi Arabia and Egypt exhibited significant antimicrobial potential against all the tested microbes, including bacteria ( Staphylococcus aureus, S. pyogenes, S. epidermidis, Salmonella typhi, Escherichia coli, Shigella spp., and Pseudomonas aeruginosa) and fungi ( Trichophyton shoenlenii and Aspergillus fumigatus), in a concentration-dependent manner ( Table 2). The ANOVA test revealed a significant difference between the two ecospecies, except in the case of S. pyogenes and T. shoenlenii ( Table S2).
